According to recent studies, the experts actually suggest it's perfectly safe - even beneficial - if you postpone taking these medications. Imagine that! I know it sounds a little strange, but sometimes letting the body fight off fevers naturally can help strengthen the immune system. So, no need to stress about those minor ailments, you got this!
